column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Vaatu says : " Are you ready for our final battle , Raava ?
#Text=" Vaatu says : " No human can stand against me .
#Text=" Wan says : " Have n't you heard the legends ?
#Text=I 'm not a regular human anymore .
#Text=" Vaatu says : " I lived ten thousand lifetimes before the first of your kind crawled out of the mud !
#Text=" Vaatu says : " It was I who broke through the divide that separated the plane of spirits from the material world !
#Text=To hate me is to give me breath .
#Text=To fight me is to give me strength .
#Text=Now prepare to face oblivion !
#Text=" Wan says : " Raava !
#Text=The only way to win is together .
#Text=Ah !
#Text=" Raava says : " I have to leave you .
#Text=If I stay any longer , you will die .
#Text=" Wan says : " It does n't matter .
#Text=If you leave me now , Vaatu will destroy everything .
#Text=We have to finish this together !
#Text=" Vaatu says : " The Harmonic Convergence is about to begin .
#Text=The era of Raava is over .
#Text="
